channel.title: LSP on jsj's notebook
channel.description: Recent content in LSP on jsj's notebook

item.title: Fluter IDE with Neovim 0.5 ,built in LSP and lua on windows
item.description: Introduction So I recently upgraded to NeoVim 0.5 stable release.This release has a inbuilt LSP(Language server protocol) which is a client to LSP servers.It also includes a Lua framework for building enhanced LSP tools. I used coc-nvim earlier as LSP client to interact with Dart LSP server which it does automatically using coc-flutter extension.If you want to know how to do that read my previous blog post for more details.
